version_description:
- Experience optimization, repair part of BUG
- Added alert screening function
- Continuous ringing reminders have been added

1. Adding shake-shake to remove completed reminder function
2. Calendar View for Increasing Editor Reminder Time
3. Optimizing Interface Vision
4. Repair BUG

1. Add password protection
2. Synchronize mobile phone notifications
3. Fix some errors

1. Increase the voice input function
2. Notification Delayed Reminder Function
3. Optimizing the Use Experience
Even a little optimization is progress.

1. Added voice function
2. Optimize visual effects
3. Optimize the interactive experience

1. Add the boot animation
2. Add location reminder
3. Optimize some visual effects

1. App preview in some areas
2. Optimize the interactive experience of location reminders
3. iOS13 adaptation optimization

- Optimize the iCloud sync experience
- Optimize some details of the experience
- Fit iOS 13
- Support dark mode

- Optimize the iCloud sync experience
- Optimize some details of the experience
- Partial experience optimization

【Support dark mode】

· iOS 13 has the system's Diablo mode settings, we also joined and perfectly adapted. You can use this feature according to your preferences in the app's [Settings].

【Function optimization】

· Optimize the [sort by time] function.

[Continuous reminder function]

  · Optimized the continuous reminder function, from 4 reminders to interval reminders, to achieve unlimited loop reminders and more personalized reminder settings.

[Today's list]

  · Added a default list of "Today" to help users better manage and view reminders.

[other]

  · Optimized iCloud synchronization.
  · This visual optimization.

[Function Optimization]

· Resolved an inability to get notifications caused by the 「Continuous Reminder feature」.

[new language]

· Added Korean in 「Multilingual」.

[Custom repeat]

  · Add custom repeat function, you can set the hour, day, week, month, and year frequency in the customization to remind. For example: you can set reminders to repeat every 5 hours; repeat reminders every two days; repeat reminders every Monday and Tuesday, etc., to achieve a high degree of customization.

[Time setting interface optimization]

  · Moved the loop reminder function to the time setting interface, you can conveniently select the loop reminder when setting the reminder time.

[ Subtasks ]

· This update adds a "subtask" function, which can add subtasks to tasks while editing reminder tasks. Subtasks can also be set for reminder time and reminder location, and can also be collapsed or expanded to view. Make it a stronger reminder.

[ colour ]

· You can set your favorite color for the check box of the reminder, and it is convenient for future browsing.

[Visual optimization]

· The color of some pages has been optimized; the interface of the pop-up function has been optimized to make the vision more uniform.

[Interactive optimization]

· The interaction from the homepage interface to the new or edit reminder page has been optimized to make the transition more natural; the function display of the edit reminder interface has been readjusted, and editing tasks can directly view the set function details.

[ Subtasks ]

· This update adds a "subtask" function, which can add subtasks to tasks while editing reminder tasks. Subtasks can also be set for reminder time and reminder location, and can also be collapsed or expanded to view. Make it a stronger reminder.

[ colour ]

· You can set your favorite color for the check box of the reminder, and it is convenient for future browsing.

[Visual optimization]

· The color of some pages has been optimized; the interface of the pop-up function has been optimized to make the vision more uniform.

[Interactive optimization]

· The interaction from the homepage interface to the new or edit reminder page has been optimized to make the transition more natural; the function display of the edit reminder interface has been readjusted, and editing tasks can directly view the set function details.

[Card projection]

· Added the card projection function in the settings. After opening, the cards on the list and edit pages will be shaded.

[Widget]

· Added widget content display management. In the setting interface, you can set the content displayed by the widgets, and the display order will be arranged according to the order of the list, achieving a higher custom configuration.

[Functional optimization]

· Optimized the relationship between tasks and sub-tasks;
· Repeated reminders for generating rules on the edit page.

[Language optimization]

· Optimized Russian language translation.

[Card projection]

· Added the card projection function in the settings. After opening, the cards on the list and edit pages will be shaded.

[Widget]

· Added widget content display management. In the setting interface, you can set the content displayed by the widgets, and the display order will be arranged according to the order of the list, achieving a higher custom configuration.

[Functional optimization]

· Optimized the relationship between tasks and sub-tasks;
· Repeated reminders for generating rules on the edit page.

[Language optimization]

· Optimized Russian language translation.

[Clipboard]
· When you recognize the clipboard content, you will be automatically asked if you want to add a task after opening the app. If the clipboard contains special words such as time, the reminder time will be automatically generated after adding.

[Semantic analysis and temporal recommendation]
· When the edited content contains special words such as time, the time words will be highlighted. Clicking on the words will generate a reminder time for users to choose.

[Share reminder]
· Edited reminders can be shared with friends via email, text message and social software. After opening the link, the application will automatically open and be added to the other's application.

[Lunar calendar]
· In the Add Reminder Time panel, new buttons for switching the Gregorian and Lunar calendars are added. After switching to the Lunar Calendar, you can remind according to the set Lunar Calendar time.

[Experience Optimization]
· Optimize some interface designs and functional experiences.

[Quick reminder]
· Click the ‘Add’ button to add a reminder on the current page. When adding a reminder, it supports reminder time settings, location settings, list and color settings.

[Experience optimization]
· Optimize the experience of some features.

[Experience optimization]
· Optimize the problem of generating incorrect time after the lunar calendar repeat reminder is completed
· Add a copy function switch in the settings
Fix bugs, improve stability, and optimize interactive experience.

Optimize product experience
-Fixed some bugs.
